item.description:
Forbidden City Bistro...the superlative in  modern “Chinese fusion”, has been awarded top Chinese in the state, and top choice in “Zagat” for three consecutive years. The warm eclectic atmosphere and cozy setting transforms you straight to China. The art work and furniture has been all custom made and imported from Beijing, China.

Borrowing from their namesake and traditions, the restaurant brings you the best of regional Chinese cuisines. Peek at the menu then savor the culinary adventure...

http://www.forbiddencitybistro.com/ordereze/AboutUs.aspx

 

* Please note that this meetup is being rescheduled due to inclement weather which canceled the event previously. Won't you join us?
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Taste of the Exotic...@ Forbidden City!!!
